thread.title: BRIEF-ABM Industries Q1 Adj Earnings Per Share $0.26 From Cont Ops

title: BRIEF-ABM Industries Q1 Adj Earnings Per Share $0.26 From Cont Ops
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - ABM Industries Inc:
* ABM INDUSTRIES ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2018
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.00 TO $2.10 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.26 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.42 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 REVENUE $1.6 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.88 TO $1.98 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.26, REVENUE VIEW $1.59 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.04 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
